channel.title: Rave
channel.description: Anyone here that likes rave? I do like it. Search on "Dune - I Can't Stop Raving" at youtube, and i think you will find some nice beats.

item.title: Rave
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Yeah, I was just being picky I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Rave
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:7, topic:134180”][quote author=Trancer3 link=topic=185565.msg1725329#msg1725329 date=1188757878]

i like dance, but not harcore, happy hardcore or jumpstyle, simply becuase of the lack of creativity djs do to make it, and it makes you feel a bit fucked up after a while of a constant thud

DJ’s don’t make music…

Well some DJ’s are good in painting too ^^
[/quote]

I suppose, but my point was that “DJing” is not making music… it is simply playing it.[/quote]

That is true, but allot of DJ’s are artists too…

Read full topic

item.title: Rave
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I really can’t listen to this type of music sober, but when you are rediculously intoxicated then it’s got to be the most amazing stuff ever.

Generally I wont listen to any music like this unless it’s really trippy. Otherwise I’m gonna need either ecstasy or a shitload of booze

Read full topic
